column1: Examines basic concepts in neurobiology.  Specifically how the brain is organized, how it sends messages throughout the body, and how these messages turn into daily activities such as seeing, eating, and walking.  How these behaviors are altered due to disease or injury of the brain is also discussed.  Cannot receive credit for both BIO 126 and BIO 162. Formerly BIO 206. No credit for Biology majors or minors
